duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop reference architectures & designs, support existing standards with a comprehensive review process, and develop standards-based designs per business requirements.
Interface with other technology towers and vendors to review new solutions and act as an escalation point for critical operational issues.
Recommend and lead efforts in the area of optimization and automation within Network Services roles and responsibilities.
Design, review Scopes of Work with both internal and external teams, including budget aspects, and oversee implementation efforts across the enterprise Network.
Act as Network Team lead (SME) on projects and managed services as it relates to Network Services with Business partners and other teams.
Participate in Technology Strategy sessions and direction and conduct Root Cause Analysis (RCA) investigation for Severity 1 Network Outages.
Support BAU network operations and incidents as required and lead efforts to reduce operational costs.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Information Technology preferred or related work experience (Master's preferred)
